message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer.  We can both get a good chunk of money this way, and there's still room for negotiation.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking 60% and you getting 40%.  I think this is a good deal for both of us, considering inflation.
